Absolute.quote: "Beyond the changeable is the Unchangeable." (Katha Upanishad 2.14)

Ultimate.quote: "The Real cannot be created or destroyed." (Sankara, Vivekachudamani)

Truth.quote: "I am the way, the truth, and the life." (John 14:6)

Existence.quote: "Existence is one, though sages call it by various names." (Katha Upanishad 5.1)

Consciousness.quote: "The Self is pure consciousness." (Adi Shankara, Atma Bodha)

Essence.quote: "The essence of all beings is the Divine." (Svetasvatara Upanishad 2.16)

Presence.quote: "Closer than breathing, nearer than hands and feet." (Kabir)

Ground.quote: "God is the ground of all being." (Paul Tillich)

Reality.quote: "The real is one without a second." (Chandogya Upanishad 6.2.1)

Transcendent.quote: "Higher than the highest, deeper than the deepest." (Mundaka Upanishad)

Immanent.quote: "The kingdom of God is within you." (Luke 17:21)

Non-dual.quote: "Where there is duality, there is fear." (Brihadaranyaka Upanishad 1.4.2)

Fullness.quote: "That is full, this is full. From fullness comes fullness." (Isha Upanishad Invocation)

Void.quote: "Form is emptiness, emptiness is form." (Heart Sutra)

Atman.quote: "Ayam Atma Brahma - This Self is Brahman." (Mandukya Upanishad 2)

Sat.quote: "Sat-Chit-Ananda is the nature of Brahman." (Vedanta Sutra)

Ananda.quote: "Raso vai sah - That is the essence of bliss." (Taittiriya Upanishad 2.7)
